name: tool_vault_packager
description: ToolVault packaging system for creating deployable .pyz files

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && python packager.py tools --output dist/toolvault.pyz && mkdir -p ../../apps/vs-code/tool-vault && cp dist/toolvault.pyz ../../apps/vs-code/tool-vault/
scripts.build:spa: cd spa && npm install && npm run verify-deps && npm run build
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run build:spa
scripts.test: test -f dist/toolvault.pyz && echo 'Test passed: dist/toolvault.pyz exists' || (echo 'Test failed: dist/toolvault.pyz not found' && exit 1)
scripts.verify:shared-types: test -f shared-types/src/index.ts || (echo '‚ùå shared-types structure invalid - run: cd ../shared-types && make copy-to-tool-vault-packager' && exit 1)

author: ToolVault
